name: Vehicle_Supplier_Ratings

docs_row.name: Vehicle_Supplier_Ratings
docs_row.func_description: Retrieve ratings for the supplier of a specific vehicle.

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID. vehicle_id can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as vehicle_id inside search_results object.

search_key.description: search_key can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as search_key.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID. vehicle_id can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as vehicle_id inside search_results object.

search_key.description: search_key can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as search_key.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

breakdown.title: Overall value for money of your vehicle hire

response_summary: Europcar is a well-regarded rental company with an overall fabulous rating of 8.9 based on 3,652 reviews. Customers have particularly praised the company for its helpfulness, which received a high score of 9.1. The overall value for money of the vehicle hire was rated 8.4, while the pick-up speed was also positively reviewed with a score of 8.3. These ratings reflect a strong performance across key aspects of the rental experience.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for evaluating car rental suppliers before booking. It retrieves detailed ratings and reviews for a specific vehicle supplier, including overall score, helpfulness, value for money, and pick-up speed. The response provides insights into customer satisfaction, helping users make informed rental decisions. Vehicle ID and search key must be obtained from the SearchCarRentals API.

enhanced_parameters.vehicle_id: Unique identifier for the rental vehicle, sourced from searchCarRentals endpoint.
enhanced_parameters.search_key: Encoded search parameters including rental dates and locations.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.
enhanced_parameters.currency_code: Currency for displaying rental prices and fees.

name.description: The name of the rental company.

rating.description: Contains detailed information about the company's ratings.

average.description: The average rating of the company as a string.

title.description: A title describing the overall rating (e.g., 'Fabulous').

localisedRating.description: Contains both the display and raw values of the average rating.

displayValue.description: The average rating formatted for display.

rawValue.description: The numerical value of the average rating.

subtitle.description: A subtitle indicating the number of reviews.

breakdown.description: A list of individual rating categories with their respective scores.

ar_items.description: A category of rating with its score and title.

localisedRating.description: Contains both the display and raw values of the category rating.

displayValue.description: The category rating formatted for display.

rawValue.description: The numerical value of the category rating.

score.description: The score of the category as a string.

title.description: The title of the rating category (e.g., 'Overall value for money of your vehicle hire').
A general title describing the type of company (e.g., 'Rental company').
